item.description:
As long as there is interest, we will continue to share with you our free monthly classes, teaching you tools for transformation and guiding you to experience deep connection to your inner peace and wisdom, and to align with the greater part of who you are - Spirit/Source Energy. This is THE secret to manifesting all that you desire, and to FEELING GOOD! (lol- I just made a typo, typing in feeling "god". Same thing, I guess!)

This month we'll be focusing on expanding love - for yourself and, if you choose, to send it to those who could use this extra positive energy. The world is feeling a lot of sorrow and despair over Haiti these days. I invite you to join me in creating and sending some positive, healing energy instead.

We invite you to come to nurture yourself and to fully relax into serenity and bliss. All you’ll have to do is listen to my voice as I lead you through the process, like listening to a good story.

All are welcome! The class is appropriate whether you are a beginner to meditating, or experienced. And, please invite others to sign up and join you; and forward this to your friends, families and groups.


"Ann's guided meditations are a rare opportunity for me to intentionally dream. The hour or so of deliberate peace and good feelings have become a treasured respite for me. With Ann's assistance, I find myself able to relax and focus on my mind, body, spirit and thoughts. I leave there renewed and inspired every time!" Charlene Frary



After you RSVP, please let us know if your plans change, so we won’t be waiting for you unnecessarily.


*** If you prefer to meditate lying down, please bring whatever you might need to be comfortable: mat, pillow, blanket, etc.

Hope to see you there!

Warm heart,

Ann

group.name: "Good Vibrations" Metro West Law of Attraction Community

item.name: FREE Evening of Guided Meditations
